Posts.Content: Jul 20, 2017 11:51AM Oneoutofsix wrote: I just got mine approved now. Did they tell you they wanted to do the MRI between days 7-14 of your cycle? Luckily for me that is next week so I was able to get in for next week instead of having to wait for a few more weeks.
Posts.Title: I had mammo and ultrasound and now they want me to have MRI . 28sunnny28 Amylisa0706

Posts.Content: Jul 18, 2017 07:45AM Oneoutofsix wrote: I'm in a similar boat, had a clear mammo but not a clear ultrasound. The dr told me I need an MRI. Today the nurse told me it might take a week to before I can make an appt because they need to get it preauthorized. I literally started crying when she told me because the waiting is awful and I feel so certain there is something wrong. I look at my kids and I am just scared
